posts.post_content: Judging by the flavor text of this card and that of [Jace's Phantasm](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Jace's Phantasm), this guy is probably going to reprinted (or pre-printed, or *something*, Future Sight is so confusing!) in Return to Ravnica. Going out on a limb, the Iquati is a new guild, and Jace is somehow affiliated with it, and it has to do with milling. The card definitely goes well with Jace's milliness, if nothing else.
